quote: You may plainly perceive the traitor through his mask, he is well-known everywhere in his true colors, his rolling eyes and his honeyed tones impose only on those who do not know him.
quote_letters: YOU MAY PLAINLY PERCEIVE THE TRAITOR THROUGH HIS MASK HE IS WELL-KNOWN EVERYWHERE IN HIS TRUE COLORS HIS ROLLING EYES AND HIS HONEYED TONES IMPOSE ONLY ON THOSE WHO DO NOT KNOW HIM
